summary: The diff implements a comprehensive full-stack restaurant application with most requirements addressed. The backend (backend/main.mo) contains a single Motoko actor with all required data types and functions. The frontend includes all major screens. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps: the saved delivery addresses feature in Profile is simplified to a single address field rather than add/remove multiple addresses; the Home screen Today's Special section uses static promo cards rather than backend-driven dish cards in a horizontal scroll; the Admin revenue report grouping by day is unconfirmed; and image assets are referenced in code but their actual file presence is unconfirmed due to omitted files.

missing_requirements.requirement: User can add and remove saved delivery addresses (multiple addresses)
missing_requirements.reason: The Profile page and ProfileSetupModal use a single 'address' string field in UserProfile. There is no multi-address add/remove functionality — just one address that can be edited. REQ-9 requires users to add and remove saved delivery addresses as a list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revenue Reports tab must display a list of orders grouped by day
missing_requirements.reason: The Admin.tsx file is truncated and no grouping-by-day logic is visible. REQ-12 requires orders grouped by day in the revenue report tab.

missing_requirements.requirement: Today's Special / Special Offers horizontal scroll section with actual dish cards
missing_requirements.reason: The Home screen shows a static SPECIAL_OFFERS array with hardcoded promotional text tiles rather than a horizontal-scroll section of dish image cards driven by backend dish data.

missing_requirements.requirement: Sample coupon codes seeded in backend (e.g., SWAD10 for 10% off)
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo is truncated and no coupon seeding logic is visible in the shown portion of the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Dishes are seeded with sample data for all five categories in the backend
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo is truncated and no dish seeding or initialization logic for sample data is visible in the shown content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Custom images as static assets must be generated and present for logo, hero banner, and all five dish category images
missing_requirements.reason: The diff notes 9 files omitted due to limits. The image assets referenced in code cannot be confirmed as actually added files.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal — a modal dialog that appears after first login to collect user name and address
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify a forced profile setup modal on first login. REQ-9 describes a profile page but not a modal-based onboarding flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer component with quick links, contact info, and branding
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify a footer component. A full footer was added with navigation links and contact details.

hallucinated_features.description: Coupon management section in the Admin panel with useAddCoupon hook
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 specifies three admin tabs: Menu Management, Order Management, and Revenue Reports. A coupon management feature in the admin panel was not requested.
